name: Mirror Maker
description: In Mirror Maker, you can see clearly how the who game is structured, and you'll be able to edit scripts and CGs with ease. First download the script from the Workshop, and edit it as you want. Afte you finish making the MOD, you can upload it to Workshop directly from Mirror Maker. We now have unlocked the storyline part of the game for you to edit, and for sure, we'll definitely unlock more parts of the game later on.
